application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Cherry Crown lift to 2.5m for pedestrian clearance.T2 - Sweet Gum, Reduce from lamp by 1m for adequate light dispersal.T3 - Cherry, reduce crown by 1.5m from each branch lengths back to suitable points of strong growth due to extremely limited space for future growth.T4 - Plane, Prune for 1.5m of building clearance, reduce competing leader over road to prevent it becoming even more dominant, subordinate by 3m back to a suitable point of strong growth, crown lift tree to 6m suitable for such an arterial road, this is mostly pendulous growth that can have cut sizes not exceeding 4 to 5cm.T5 - Plane,  crown lift tree to 6m suitable for such an arterial road, this is mostly pendulous growth that can have cut sizes not exceeding 4 to 5cm.T6 - Plane, Crown clean up to 6m due to over mature epicormic, carefully sever ivy without touching the tree bark,  crown lift tree to 6m suitable for such an arterial road, this is mostly pendulous growth that can have cut sizes not exceeding 4 to 5cm.
